original: unfold PreOrder. unfold Reflexive. intros x. apply H_R with x x; auto. unfold Transitive. intros x y z Hxy Hyz. split. - intros m n Phi Psi Hrel1 Hrel2 Hmn. apply Hyz with x y z; auto. apply H_R with x y; auto. - intros m n Phi Psi Hrel1 Hrel2 Hmn. apply Hyz with x y z; auto. apply H_R with y z; auto.
